law.catch_line: A pharmacist may refill a prescription for a drug or device for which the refill has not been author...

text.section: If a pharmacist refills a prescription under subsection (a) of this section, the pharmacist may provide only 1 refill of the prescription and the refill quantity dispensed shall be in conformity with the prescriber's directions for use and may not exceed a 14-day supply or unit of use.
